DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether galvanic vestibular stimulation is effective in the treatment of spatial neglect after right brain-damage.
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Effects of Galvanic Vestibular Stimulation (GVS) on Spatial Neglect
DOC.criteria: spatial neglect after unilateral ischemic infarction or unilateral haemorrhage Chronic epilepsy Metallic implants (including pacemakers) Brain tumors Scalp inflammation Degenerative disease
